description: This file defines a REST controller in a Spring Boot application providing basic endpoints such as a welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: REST controller providing basic endpoints for backend health, info, and documentation redirection.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when accessed.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI page, preserving the original scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating the application's health status.
